content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position (x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), a boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and a steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Connected by pipe groups at positions (x=107.5 y=-34.5) and (x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport belts at positions (x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel levels of boilers and steam engines to prevent them from running out of fuel.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before starting production.
- Regularly check the inventory of stone furnaces to prevent them from running out of ingredients.

### Errors due to disconnection from the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network before starting operations.
- Regularly check the connections of steam engines to prevent them from becoming disconnected.

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty or full before starting operations.
- Regularly check the status of pipe groups to prevent them from becoming empty or full.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
